title: Energy Crystal Set — Lost Objects, Found Treasures
description: Each Energy Crystal set comes with a mix of Quartz Point, Rough Quartz and Geode Quartz crystals. Each set of 9 comes with a velvet pouch (3.2 x 3.9) and in a descriptive gift box (6.1 x 5.1 x 1.4). Natural Crystal and Velvet.
